column4: has anyone else had problems installing nvidia drivers from the installer they provided?
I use the ubuntu .debs rather than nvidia installers
what's wrong with the ubuntu packages?
the fps rates are so low I wonder if im using an old CL
that's odd - it's accelerated for me
I never got a reply from you
I had asked if that error was in your /var/log/Xorg.0.log.
nothings changed. Still the same "Xlib: extension "GLX" missing on display ":0.0"." error
